body.name: Wrath of the Lone Rider: A Historical Western Adventure Novel
body.description: Deep in the heart of an untamed frontier, Ezra Fielding, once a celebrated bounty hunter, craves more than just thrill-chasing exploits. When he sets his sights on the lovely Penny, he abandons his perilous past and uses his poker winnings and hard-earned fees to secure a ranch house nestled in the wilderness. Just as the dust settles though, something is about to shake up their newfound haven...What mysterious forces conspire to turn their sanctuary into a battleground of darkness and danger?As the town enjoys the peacefulness of Ezra's choice, a storm looms on the horizon. The accidental death of Peter Winters, a powerful bureaucrat's heir, becomes a turning point in their lives. Blinded by grief, Peter's father blames Ezra and the entire town for the tragedy that befell his son. Suspicion grows that he's involved in destroying nearby ranches and farms while enjoying his position of power…Can Ezra and his comrades stand strong against all that threatens to consume their beloved land?United by a common purpose, Ezra, Penny, and their loyal companions devise a plan to reclaim their town. Each passing day intensifies the flames of their struggle… Will they uncover the hidden truth behind this mystery and put an end to the destruction?"Wrath of the Lone Rider" is a historical adventure novel of approximately 60,000 words. No cliffhangers, only pure unadulterated action. Read more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wanting a different life
reviews.reviewText: Ezra is a bounty Hunter and a good one but dreams of being a rancher. He also wants a wife and family and has a young woman in mind. But can he do this if he doesn’t have all that he needs to make it happen? Will he get his wish? I voluntarily reviewed an Advance Reader Copy of this book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ezra and Penny, working hand in hand, leads us on an exciting pathway to success!
reviews.reviewText: Most definitely another five star sensation by one of my most favorite authors! This well well rounded series of unending excitement will pacifys anyone's desired expectations, cover to cover!the Author's outstanding storylines has Ezra, and his associates, leading his readers through one exciting western pathway after the other. No slow downs in this compelling western masterpiece! Too, the characters, both good and bad, will, most definitely titilate anyone's desired expectations from beginning to end!Most definitely recommend this compelling series of ongoing excitement to all readers, but especially you non western enthusiasts will find yourselves unable put the story aside until the epilogue has been read! Happy trails!!!😃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ezra Fielding had a very rough job as a bounty hunter and he was ready to retire and marry. He had always wanted to marry Penny but her father wouldn't let that happen unless he found a new line of work. Then an accident happens while Ez was in a poker tournament that made him quit in a hurry. A young man he was playing with got drunk and was cheating with the cards. He breaks a bottle and tries to go after Ezra and instead falls on it and dies. Life wasted and the trouble that follows causes problems for the whole town.Very well written story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars not a good read very boring
reviews.reviewText: You could probably enjoy this book if you like mush.The plot very nonsensical little to no action at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very enjoyable book that was difficult to put down!
reviews.reviewText: This book follows the life of the main character Ezera and the choices he makes. Ezra starts out as a bounty hunter and is very good at his chosen profession. Yet Ezra has a dream that dream is to settle down and be a rancher, we follow his change in occupation, while also meeting the woman he wants to marry Penny her friend Lucy and Ezra's friend jimmy. These main characters deal with life and everyday hardships. The story has several very interesting plot shifts that will keep the reader on their toes and wanting more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First, I tried to give it 3 stars, but the proram won't it! Rigged?Grief is real, but to set a man on a terrorist plot?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A wonderful western with lots of action and a fantastic storyline. If you love a good read, then this would be the book for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved this story of Ezra, Penny and their friends and neighbors. So many exciting twists and turns to keep you involved.

Ezra Fielding gave up being a bounty hunter when he met Penny and decided to settle down. He used his bounty hunting fees and poker winnings to purchase a ranch. The accidental death of Peter Winters begins troubles that are far-reaching. Danger abounds, time after time. Fast-paced action throughout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 7, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: Hate books with one sentence paragraphs.
reviews.reviewText: Happy it ended, felt like there was too much filler and not much story. Hard to find a good western.
